title: Shirokuma Yakuza to Akujiki Hime
description:
Yukinari, a yakuza bear loyal to his boss, gets seriously injured and ends up being the caretaker of his old man's only daughter," Lady Sayoko".
Sayoko is quiet and mature for her age, but she is a princess with bad eating habits who does not care about food!
Yukinari is worried about her eating habits and tries to get her to eat delicious, nutritious food, in one way or the other...!
A delicious heartfelt story of a fluffy caretaker and a little girl.
